RTL support note

There are two modes for RTL support at the moment:

  • Legacy — render each text run as is according to the Unicode rules and copy/paste to/from the clipboard as-is.
  • Raw Experimental — render anything as LTR and copy/paste to/from the clipboard as-is.

Note: At the moment, if the raw mode is in use, any of the U+200E U+200F U+2066 U+2067 U+2068 U+2069 U+202A U+202B U+202C U+202D U+202E bidirectional markup characters are removed from the search widget text.
